scripts.start: export development=true && npm run nvm && expo start
scripts.android: export development=true && npm run nvm && expo start --android
scripts.ios: export development=true && npm run nvm && expo start --ios
scripts.web: export development=true && npm run nvm && expo start --web
scripts.hybrid: export development=true && npm run nvm && expo start --android --web
scripts.publish:development: export $(grep '^[a-zA-Z_]*=.*' .env | xargs) && expo publish -c --release-channel development && npm run compile:web
scripts.compile:ios: export $(grep '^[a-zA-Z_]*=.*' .env.production | xargs) && export SENTRY_LOG_LEVEL='debug' && expo build:ios && expo upload:ios
scripts.ncu: git diff --exit-code > /dev/null && ncu --configFileName .ncurc.js -u && npm run bust && npm run baseline || echo 'ERROR: commit your stuff'
scripts.publish: export $(grep '^[a-zA-Z_]*=.*' .env | xargs) && expo publish && npm run compile:web
scripts.bust: npm cache clean --force && rm -fr $TMPDIR/metro* && watchman watch-del-all && jest --clearCache || echo 'ERROR: run failed busts manually'
scripts.baseline: npm run nvm && npm run bust && rm -f package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && npm i
